messages.subject: a call from People Magazine
messages.msgSnippet: Someone named Wendy [missed her last name] from People Magazine just called me.  Preliminary inquiries on an unschooling article. I made her listen to my
messages.messageBody:
Someone named Wendy [missed her last name] from People Magazine just
called me. Preliminary inquiries on an unschooling article.
I made her listen to my objections about prior articles "balancing"
lamely. Then I talked to her a while.

Is there a family here who might really be interested in being
interviewed and photographed? I'm not even positive she'll call me
back, and I didn't get e-mail or anything, but if there's someone
photogenic and keen to be quoted, I'd like to make that
recommendation if she does call back.

Sandra
